title: Script writer for a youtube channel
job_overview:
Looking for a script writer for my bodycam channel.
Example channel Upgrade to see actual info

Requirements 
Must be able to follow a script format closely
2000 words per script 
3 scripts per week 
Must be able to link sources to significant pieces of information 

Please only apply if the following are applicable  to you 
1. Turnaround time of 48 hours per script 
2. Strong understanding of youtube retention in this particular niche 
3. Being able to find source material for the video.

Optional : write an example hook using the following as video title

"Cops arrested a "fake agent" and gets sued for $200,000.00 

Reveal the hook at the very beginning of your application. 

If you read and understand all of the above , use the word "BANANA" as your subject line

Look forward to working together.
